snippet: The newest owner of The New Republic magazine is Chris Hughes, a new media guru who co-founded Facebook and helped to run the online organizing machine for Barack Obama's presidential campaign.
abstract: The newest owner of The New Republic magazine is Chris Hughes, a new media guru who co-founded Facebook and helped to run the online organizing machine for Barack Obama's presidential campaign.

byline.original: By BRIAN STELTER and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: New Republic Gets an Owner Steeped in New Media
headline.print_headline: New Republic Gets an Owner Steeped in New Media
